name: The 3 Pillars Podcast
who_you_serve: The podcast serves individuals interested in personal growth, healing practices, and creative expression, appealing to a broad audience including entrepreneurs and wellness enthusiasts.
what_you_do: The 3 Pillars Podcast focuses on discussing various topics related to personal development, healing, and creativity through interviews and discussions with various guests.
current_projects: Season 3 of the podcast featuring poetry reads and discussions.
business_focus: The 3 Pillars Podcast focuses on discussing various topics related to personal development, healing, and creativity through interviews and discussions with various guests. (podcasting)
